div.div:
<a href="#" title="<%- _t('Root') %>" aria-label="<%- _t('Root') %>" data-path="/">
      <%= homeIcon %> /
    
    <% pathParts.forEach((part, idx) => {
      if(part){
        if(idx > 0){ %>
          /
        <% } %>
        <a href="#" class="crumb" data-path="<%- part %>"><%- part %>
      <% }
    }); %>

thead.tr: <label for="selectAllInputCheckbox" class="hiddenStructure" aria-label="<%- _t('Select all') %>"><%- _t('Select all') %> <%- _t('Title') %> <% activeColumns.forEach((column, idx) => { %> <% if(column !== 'Description' && hasOwnProperty.call(availableColumns, column)) { %> <%- availableColumns[column] %> <% } %> <% }); %> <%- _t("Actions") %>
